MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4pm to repair faulty overhead line equipment at Armheugh and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.11pm on the 16th of February 2021.
